version_description:
With your inquiries,
The app goes in the right direction!

so, I updated
"Folder Function at Idea Note"
"Fixed bug that icons are not displayed in correlation diagram"

With your inquiries,
The app goes in the right direction!

so, I updated
"Folder Function at Idea Note"
"Fixed bug that icons are not displayed in correlation diagram"

Looking at the finished picture, I think it's "perfect!",
But there are times when I think "I don't think so..."
( What is that? )

Same think happen at program

So I updated folder function!
- Folder name can be changed and deleted
- Added character items (nicknames, habits, relationships with siblings, actions against difficulties)
- bug fix

Looking at the finished picture, I think it's "perfect!",
But there are times when I think "I don't think so..."
( What is that? )

Same think happen at program

So I updated folder function!
- Folder name can be changed and deleted
- Added character items (nicknames, habits, relationships with siblings, actions against difficulties)
- bug fix

Have you experience like found a typo when you can't turn back ...?

So, This update is bug fix!

Have you experience like found a typo when you can't turn back ...?

So, This update is bug fix!

A new work by Osamu Tezuka has come out!


The work of Mr. Osamu Tezuka has a slightly special effect called "star system"
This system is like "A certain character that was created before comes out as another character" (Is it correct?),
I have a glimpse of whether what will be happen to this character in other story, and I really like it!

So this update is
"You can add the character used in another plot to the current plot"


Also, the function to initialize the character arrangement of the correlation diagram has been added!

A new work by Osamu Tezuka has come out!


The work of Mr. Osamu Tezuka has a slightly special effect called "star system"
This system is like "A certain character that was created before comes out as another character" (Is it correct?),
I have a glimpse of whether what will be happen to this character in other story, and I really like it!

So this update is
"You can add the character used in another plot to the current plot"


Also, the function to initialize the character arrangement of the correlation diagram has been added!

You can find your own order on the bookshelf.
In my case, my favorite manga order
So the order changes every time you clean up
What about you?

so,
Character order can now be changed!

You can find your own order on the bookshelf.
In my case, my favorite manga order
So the order changes every time you clean up
What about you?

so,
Character order can now be changed!

The cherry blossoms are starting to change color
The personally recommended for Cherry blossom viewing is the "grave yard"!
There is no banquet and it is quiet, so you can enjoy it slowly while walking!
Daytime is good because It's not scary!

That's why the story plotter was also colored!
You can now set colors for "arrows in the correlation diagram", "Idea" and "characters"

Also, it has been modified to make it easier to use!

The cherry blossoms are starting to change color
The personally recommended for Cherry blossom viewing is the "grave yard"!
There is no banquet and it is quiet, so you can enjoy it slowly while walking!
Daytime is good because It's not scary!

That's why the story plotter was also colored!

Also, it has been modified to make it easier to use!
We've also fixed the parts that were left over from the last bug fix.
We've also fixed the parts that were left over from the last bug fix.

I appreciate your suggestions!

Bug fix!

I appreciate your suggestions!

Bug fix!

We all have to belong somewhere.
Company, family, community, etc.

That's why I added "You can set up groups in a correlation chart"!

We all have to belong somewhere.
Company, family, community, etc.

That's why I added "You can set up groups in a correlation chart"!

I feel that small bug fixes are the most important thing.
So, it's a bug fix! (Sorry, many times)

I feel that small bug fixes are the most important thing.
So, it's a bug fix! (Sorry, many times)

And most importantly, it's not fast enough!
So, instead of the developer manually issuing the password, we made the program do it for us!

And most importantly, it's not fast enough!
So, instead of the developer manually issuing the password, we made the program do it for us!

Christmas... alone... headache...!
Let's put those memories in a folder and not look at them!

That's why I improved the folders!
Up until now, empty folders would disappear, but that's no longer the case!
Also, you can now reorder them!

That's why I improved the folders!
Up until now, empty folders would disappear, but that's no longer the case!
Also, you can now reorder them!

Have you finished cleaning your house?
I'm not yet

Regardless of the room, I will work on cleaning the app!
That's why it's an update around the idea note
